title: The development in any plot of land shall be such as to preserve, as far as practicable,the existing trees
clause_text: The development in any plot of land shall be such as to preserve, as far as practicable,the existing trees.Where trees are required to be felled, twice the number of trees shall be planted for every tree to be felled.
